product_name: Nikon Trailblazer ATB Waterproof 10 x 25 Binoculars
long_description: The all-purpose Trailblazer ATBTM compact binoculars have multi-coated lenses and offer waterproof and fog-proof performance for your viewing pleasure while hiking and backpacking.
short_description: The all-purpose Trailblazer ATBTM compact binoculars have multi-coated lenses and offer waterproof and fog-proof performance for your viewing pleasure while hiking and backpacking.
